name: 劉俊麟
objective:
學習智慧型手機的程式設計，課程包含應用程式基礎、準備開發環境、認識開發環境、使用者介面、各種使用者元件、資料存取、檔案存取、通訊與網路、硬體資料的存取。
This course will learn how to program the mobile phones, the topics including: basics of applications programming, preparing development environment, working on development environment, user interface, components, access of data and file, communication and network, access of hardware.
schedule:
Week 1: Course Syllabus、Kotlin Programming and IntelliJ IDEA (1/4)
Week 2: Kotlin Programming (2/4) 
Week 3: Kotlin Programming (3/4)
Week 4: Kotlin Programming (4/4)
Week 5: Android Studio 與專案架構 (Ch. 01), 介面設計與元件佈局 (Ch. 02)
Week 6: 物件控制與事件監聽 (Ch. 03)
Week 7: Activity (Ch. 04)
Week 8: Fragment (Ch. 05) 與 訊息提示元件 (Ch. 06)
Week 9: 清單元件 (或進階清單元件) (Ch. 07/08)
Week 10: 同步與非同步執行 (Ch. 09) 與動畫製作 (Ch. 10)
Week 11: 多媒體應用 (Ch.11)
Week 12: SQLite 資料庫 (Ch.15)
Week 13: 網路應用程式 (Ch.17)
Week 14: 通知訊息 (Ch. 18)
Week 15: 人工智慧 (Ch. 19)
Week 16: ViewModel 與 LiveData (Ch. 20)
Week 17/18:  Final Android App Project Report & Demo
scorePolicy:
Attendance: 10% (5 roll calls)
Assignments: 30% (3~4 assignments)
Midterm Android APP Project: 30% (individual, assigned topic)
Final Android APP project: 30% (individual, free topics)
materials:

1. "Android Kotlin 實作開發 (精心設計 24 個 Lab 讓你快速上手)"， 第 3 版，黃士嘉、麥光廷，博碩文化出版

References: 
1. "Kotlin in Action" by Dmitry Jemerov and Svetlana Isakova, Manning
2. https://developer.android.com/jetpack/compose
